original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Santhavavagga
analyzed: santhava vagga

original: 10. Dhammadesanāyaappossukkapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, tumhe bhaṇatha—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti.
analyzed: tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena ca etthantare sabbaññuta ñāṇam paripācitam mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya ati

original: Puna ca ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti.
analyzed: puna ca sabbaññu tam pattassa appa ussukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya ati

original: Yathā nāma, bhante nāgasena, issāso vā issāsantevāsī vā bahuke divase saṅgāmatthāya upāsanaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mahāyuddhe osakkeyya;
analyzed: yathā nāma bhante nāgasena issāsaḥ vā issāsa antevāsī vā bahuke divase saṅgāma atthāya upāsanam sikkhitvā sampatte mahā yuddhe osakkeyya

original: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena

original: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ
analyzed: ca etthantare sabbaññu ta ñāṇam paripācetvā mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññu ta

original: pattena dhammadesanāya osakkitaṁ.
analyzed: pattena dhamma desanāya osakkita

original: Yathā vā pana, bhante nāgasena, mallo vā mallantevāsī vā bahuke divase nibbuddhaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mallayuddhe osakkeyya;
analyzed: yathā vā pana bhante nāgasena mallaḥ vā malla antevāsī vā bahuke divase nibbuddham sikkhitvā sampatte malla yuddhe osakkeyya

original: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena

original: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ
analyzed: ca etthantare sabbaññu ta ñāṇam paripācetvā mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññu ta

original: pattena dhammadesanāya osakkitaṁ.
analyzed: pattena dhamma desanāya osakkita

original: Kiṁ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena bhayā osakkitaṁ, udāhu apākaṭatāya osakkitaṁ,
analyzed: kim nu khalu bhante nāgasena tathāgatena bhayā osakkitaḥ udāhu apākaṭatāya osakkita

original: udāhu dubbalatāya osakkitaṁ, udāhu asabbaññutāya osakkitaṁ, kiṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ, iṅgha
analyzed: udāhu dubbala tāya osakkita udāhu asabbaññutāya osakkita kim tattha kāraṇe iṅgha

original: me tvaṁ kāraṇaṁ brūhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇāya.
analyzed: me tvam kāraṇam brūhi kaṅkhā vitaraṇāya

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena

original: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya, tena
analyzed: ca etthantare sabbaññuta ñāṇam paripācitam mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya tena

original: hi ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: hi sabbaññu tam pattassa appa ussukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya ati yam tam micchā

original: Yadi sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami no dhammadesanāya, tena hi ‘tathāgatena
analyzed: yadi sabbaññu tam pattassa appa ussukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya tena hi tathāgatena

original: catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ
analyzed: catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena ca etthantare sabbaññuta ñāṇam

original: mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya ati tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gambhīro dunnibbeṭho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañhaḥ gambhīraḥ dunnibbeṭhaḥ tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Paripācitañca, mahārāja, tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena
analyzed: paripācitam ca mahā rāja tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānam sata sahassena

original: ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya, pattasabbaññutassa
analyzed: ca etthantare sabbaññuta ñāṇam mahataḥ jana kāyassa samuddharaṇāya patta sabbaññutassa

original: ca appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya.
analyzed: ca appossukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya

original: Tañca pana dhammassa gambhīranipuṇaduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppaṭivedhataṁ sattānañca
analyzed: tat ca pana dhammassa gambhīra nipuṇa duddasa duranubodha sukhuma duppaṭivedha tam sattānam ca

original: ālayārāmataṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷhasuggahitatañca disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ nu kho’ti
analyzed: ālaya ārāma tam sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷha suggahita tam ca disvā kim nu kho katham nu kho iti

original: appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
analyzed: appossukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya sattānam paṭivedha cintana mānasam yeveta

original: Yathā, mahārāja, bhisakko sallakatto anekabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ naraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ cintayati ‘kena nu kho upakkamena katamena vā bhesajjena imassa byādhi vūpasameyyā’ti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja bhisakkaḥ sallakattaḥ aneka byādhi paripīḍitam naram upasaṅkamitvā evam cintayati kena nu kho upakkamena katamena vā bhesajjena imassa byādhi vūpasameyya ati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa sabbakilesabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ janaṁ dhammassa
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa sabba kilesa byādhi paripīḍitam janam dhammassa

original: ca gambhīranipuṇaduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppaṭivedhataṁ disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ
analyzed: ca gambhīra nipuṇa duddasa duranubodha sukhuma duppaṭivedha tam disvā kim nu kho katha

original: nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
analyzed: nu kho ti appa ussukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya sattānam paṭivedha cintana mānasam yeveta

original: Yathā, mahārāja, rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa dovārikaanīkaṭṭhapārisajjanegamabhaṭabalaamaccarājaññarājūpajīvine
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja raññaḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa dovārika anīkaṭṭha pārisajja negama bhaṭa bala amacca rājañña rāja upajīvine

original: jane disvā evaṁ cittamuppajjeyya ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ nu kho ime saṅgaṇhissāmī’ti;
analyzed: jane disvā evam cittam uppajjeyya kim nu kho katham nu kho ime saṅgaṇhissāmi iti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa dhammassa gambhīranipuṇaduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppaṭivedhataṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa dhammassa gambhīra nipuṇa duddasa duranubodha sukhuma duppaṭivedha ta

original: sattānañca ālayārāmataṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷhasuggahitatañca disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho, kathaṁ
analyzed: sattānam ca ālaya ārāma tam sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā daḷha suggahita tam ca disvā kim nu kho katha

original: nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya, sattānaṁ paṭivedhacintanamānasaṁ yevetaṁ.
analyzed: nu kho ti appa ussukka tāya cittam nami no dhamma desanāya sattānam paṭivedha cintana mānasam yeveta

original: Api ca, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ dhammatā esā, yaṁ brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
analyzed: api ca mahā rāja sabbesam tathāgatānam dhamma tā esā yam brahmunā āyācitāḥ dhammam desenti

original: Tattha pana kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: tattha pana kiṅkāraṇa

original: Ye tena samayena manussā tāpasaparibbājakā samaṇabrāhmaṇā, sabbete brahmadevatā honti
analyzed: ye tena samayena manussā tāpasa paribbājakā samaṇa brāhmaṇā sabbe ete brahma devatāḥ honti

original: brahmagarukā brahmaparāyaṇā, tasmā tassa balavato yasavato ñātassa paññātassa uttarassa
analyzed: brahmagarukāḥ brahma parāyaṇā tasmai tassa balavataḥ yasavataḥ ñātassa paññātassa uttarassa

original: accuggatassa onamanena sadevako loko onamissati okappessati adhimuccissatīti iminā
analyzed: accuggatassa onamanena sa devakaḥ lokaḥ onamissati okappessati adhimuccissati iti iminā

original: ca, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
analyzed: ca mahā rāja kāraṇena tathāgatāḥ brahmunā āyācitāḥ dhammam desenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, koci rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā yassa onamati apacitiṁ karoti, balavatarassa tassa onamanena avasesā janatā onamati apacitiṁ karoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja koci rājā vā rāja mahāmattaḥ vā yassa onamati apacitim karoti balavatarassa tassa onamanena avasesā janatā onamati apacitim karoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, brahme onamite tathāgatānaṁ sadevako loko onamissati, pūjitapūjako,
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja brahme onamite tathāgatānam sa devakaḥ lokaḥ onamissati pūjita pūjakaḥ

original: mahārāja, loko, tasmā so brahmā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ āyācati dhammadesanāya, tena
analyzed: mahā rāja tasmai saḥ brahmā sabbesam tathāgatānam āyācati dhamma desanāya tena

original: ca kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desentī”ti.
analyzed: ca kāraṇena tathāgatāḥ brahmunā āyācitāḥ dhammam desenti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, sunibbeṭhito pañho, atibhadrakaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena su nibbeṭhito pañhaḥ ati bhadrakam veyyākaraṇe evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Dhammadesanāya appossukkapañho dasamo.
analyzed: dhamma desanāya appossukka pañhaḥ dasamaḥ
